text: Ane hum te vastuthi kevi rite darum, jene tame bhagidara banavi che, jo ke tame te vatathi nathi darata ke tame loko allahani sathe evi vastune bhagidara theravi che, jena vise allaha ta'ala'e ko'i purava avatarita nathi karya, to te banne jutho manthi salamatino vadhare hakadara kona che? Jo tame janata hova
